_route: (==) This route follows .link([BingsF's 15:40 run]https://www.speedrun.com/botw/run/ywvpqrpz) from 2022-12-10. VODs for some segments may link to other runs with better examples of the same movement. For older routes, see the end of the document. For a version of the route with clock-based directions, see .link([here]https://celer.itntpiston.app/#/gh/sobolews/omegabow/omegabow-v1-clock).
(?=) Questions or Corrections? Join the .link([BOTW Speedrunning discord]	https://discord.gg/94YzaMFZxC) and ask in the 100% channel!

(==) Recommended options (bottom of screen): |
Theme: Granatus | Split Settings: Split on Shrine, Tower, Other.

Before Starting: (^=) Ensure the clock is at least a day ahead of any existing saves on your profile.

SoR clip.notes: After cutscene, hold ZL and hop left to exit

_Equipment::Weapon<Torch and Axe>.notes: Sidehop down the hill while grabbing torch to avoid dialogue

_Material<2 Shrooms>.notes: Can grab more peppers and shrooms. You may eat them if needed, but keep at least 3 of each.

.!!(Unequip) weapon.notes: Opening Traveler's Bow chest triggers an autosave, which we'll use in inventory corruption. We don't want the shield and materials in this autosave.

Wait for autosave.notes: After autosave is complete, pick everything up and immediately save. Then change system clock to 1 day in the past. This will protect the Traveler's Bow autosave and the SoR autosave from the beginning of the game from getting deleted.

.!!(System Clock -1 day).notes: If using DST, no need to change clock.

_Material<2 Endura Shroom>.notes: Save one to cook, can eat the other

_Material<1 Acorn>.notes: Do not eat. Do not pick up extra acorns.

_Material<10 Hearty Durians>.notes: Eat as needed, but save one for quest

_Material<3 Raw Bird Drumstick>.notes: Murder the crows near the shrine. If you get here at night and they're gone, substitute with 3 apples near Impa's house. You can use extra for food if needed, but keep at least 3.

Drop 4 Tree Branch.notes: While waiting for castle cutscene to trigger

_Equipment::Bow<Royal Bow>.notes: Don't shoot it until Hateno, its durability gets transferred to your omegabow.

Kill 1-3 .enemy(Stalkers).notes: Looking for 0-3 Screws, 1 Spring and 1 Shaft. Pick up a Core if you get one. Do not pick up extra.

_Shrine::KayaWan.notes: Skip Ancient Core if you already have one

Kill .enemy(Green Lizalfos).notes: Take horn, and 1 talon if it drops

_Shrine::DakaTuss.notes: .code(Eat the steak) to heal if you haven't already

_Equipment::Shield<Pot Lid>.notes: Don't damage this one too much. A few hits is okay.

_Material<1 Energetic Rhino Beetle>.notes: On tree near shop. Make morning if needed.

_Material<2 Fairies>.notes: Only 1 is needed, but extra for safety is good. Don't lose the last fairy.

Shoot Farosh (Scale).notes: If you get here early enough, Farosh will spawn as you glide in. Otherwise, you'll need to sleep an extra time.

Kill .enemy(Black Lizalfos).notes: 3 headshots will kill it. Try to aim it away from the heavy grass, to avoid the parts catching fire and burning.

_Material<1 Lizalfos Talon>.notes: You want a total of exactly 1 tail, 2 horns, and 1 talon. Kill the green and/or blue lizalfos in this area if missing any parts.

_Material<8 Hyrule + 1 Hearty Bass>.comment: Bomb the pond to stun them

IST + omegabow.notes: Follow these .link([Detailed Instructions]https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1vXQIsRddX9Ihg8HJ_dKgAeOyXBod6XJ6qI3-lwi6Ml8/edit?usp=sharing), or this .link([video tutorial]https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1714388492?t=1h8m34s). The omegabow should be used to kill all boss enemies (hinoxes, taluses, moldugas, etc) except where otherwise specified.

_Tod::Noon.notes: Need no rain to deliver blue flame

Eat speedfood + 3 stam food.notes: To make room for cooking later

_Npc<Lady on dock>.notes: Secret of the Cedars shrine quest

Slated for Upgrades.notes: If less than 3 screws, upgrade sensor when you come back later

.!!(Save, close game, reload).notes: (optional) Clears IST glitch and warps back up to tech lab. If you don't close game here, then you must do so before loading the save after killing Dark Beast Ganon. Do not load any saves from here on until you close the software, or your key items will get messed up.

_Korok::N49.notes: .link([Bomb arrow visual cue]https://twitter.com/TaoPlusPlus/status/1540503079191252999?s=20&t=-pM3S_ko1Yn6rZwKS3-wHw). Windbomb over if it's raining.

_Npc::SheikaMale<Olkin>.notes: At pumpkin patch before 5pm; goes to shelter near northern campfire at 5pm; starts running around the village at 8pm

Enter Medoh.notes: 1 ancient arrow per cannon. Visual cues: .link([Left-Right]https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/293465650540838913/688224174937735188/a3.png), .link([Middle]https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/293465650540838913/688224173427785910/a4.png)

.boss(Windblight Ganon).notes: Check VOD for 1-cycle setup and 5th terminal strat. Avoid head shots. Ancient Arrow + .rune(Stasis) â†’ 3 FDB body + 1 OB

_Chest::Special<Great Eagle Bow>.notes: DON'T use until you dupe it

_Equipment::Bow<2 Spiked Boko Bow>.notes: If here early enough, can take while they're asleep. Otherwise kill them.

_Material<Luminous Stones>.notes: 10 needed, can get more later. Take any flint you get too.

_Tod::Morning.notes: Timing for ice house quest and Beedle at stable

Great Eagle Bow dupe.notes: .link([Duping Tutorial]https://youtu.be/ZmwUDr36i1E). Overload using FDB, duplex bow, and 2 omegabows. Dupe until 5 GEBs, keeping the Royal Bow. Leave FDB behind for an open bow slot. .link([Note regarding bows]https://pastebin.com/raw/z4Rv6Ebi)

.boss(Kohga).notes: Clear ragdoll and skew during Kohga

.dir(E) + midair.notes: Wait until Riju's question, then choose "Keep up the fight!" Use minimap to find Naboris.

_Npc::Gerudo<Ice House>.notes: Bring ice up stairs, then melt. Stand over it and shoot the top face with a fire arrow to get a consistent size.

_Npc<Beedle>.notes: Beedle leaves at 4pm. Make noon if needed.

_Material<Electric Darner>.notes: Mash A as you pick up the rock

_Tod::Noon.notes: Timing to reach Suma Sahma between 4:00pm and 5:30pm. Make noon later in this segment if you're getting there too late.

_Boss::Talus::Luminous.notes: Intentionally "wasting" a fury. Look for amber, flint, and luminous stones.

.dir(<E).notes: See map or vod for where to drop in

.dir(N).notes: Reposition pebble and use to windbomb

_Korok::W60.notes: There is an RNG lizalfos that may have a Moblin Club. Take it to skip getting it later.

Activate .!!(Pedestal).notes: 4:00-5:30pm. After 4:40pm, you can use a cryo block in the puddle.

Kill .enemy(Blue Lizalfos).notes: IST leaves us with 8 of 9 required lizalfos horns. Get the 9th one here.

.dir(W>) + midair.notes: Place bombs and detonate as fast as possible in wind.

_Korok::N30.notes: Aim with bow to get apples to spawn

.dir(<E) + .dir(<W).notes: .link([Dow Naeh vod]https://youtu.be/KYhfrqeINmE?t=11825). Windbomb .dir(<E) away from the mountain, until you reach the trees on the minimap, and then back. Otherwise, Naydra will not spawn. Make morning at the spot marked on the map, and point the camera up at the peak of the mountain.

_Discover<Luto's Crossing>.notes: Discover location as you fly over

_Npc::ZoraFemale<Pink Girl>.notes: Will be running toward west stairs

_Npc::ZoraMale<Diving Guy>.notes: Diving is Beauty! quest reward is 5 Fleet-Lotus Seed, will use for transmutation.

_Npc::ZoraMale<Fronk>.notes: 7:00am to 8:00pm, Fronk is at the pillar. Otherwise he is .link([at the pools]https://youtu.be/3EltLt0dpks?t=2686).

_Boss::Talus::Luminous.notes: Wake with bomb arrow, then use AA. Collect all amber, flint, and luminous stones. If you don't have 10 amber by now, break ores in Eldin and Rudania entry until you have 10.

.dir(<W).notes: Windbombs won't work during the first of burn damage. Make sure to windbomb either before Link catches fire, or after the second tick.

_Tod::Night.notes: To talk to Greyson. Must have Flamebreaker Armor equipped to sleep.

_Npc::Goron<Yunobo>.notes: You can get into the cave before the rocks load in. If you don't, ESC through the back. .link([Example of clip in.]https://youtu.be/s8UMMQmUioQ?list=PLxRHLKOlaIbj6REgghSRSqMeAPxUX33ax&t=5167)

_Korok::E06.notes: Ore deposits here for amber if still needed

_Boss::Talus::Igneo.notes: Igneo taluses have the best chance to drop flint. Collect drops here and from the remaining three igneo taluses until you have 11 flint.

midair .dir(N>).notes: See map for where to drop in

_Korok::H22.notes: WB away while it's rolling, but don't get too far away.

_Tod::Morning.notes: .link([Gorae Torr vod]https://youtu.be/s8UMMQmUioQ?list=PLxRHLKOlaIbj6REgghSRSqMeAPxUX33ax&t=6035). If it's between 12:00am and 5:00am, make morning twice to properly advance a day for Dinraal.
Look west when sitting at campfire. Facing east can stop Dinraal from spawning.

_Material<Lynel Hoof>.notes: 94% chance to get one, but if you don't, kill lynel near A07.

_Snap::Quest<Kilton>.notes: It's common for the camera to not register Kilton. Take 2-3 snaps from different angles to be safe.

_Snap::Quest<Blupee>.notes: If the Blupees run away, you can take a backup picture later at Kakariko.

Look up .!!(East) in the sky.notes: .link([Tu Kaloh vod]https://youtu.be/KYhfrqeINmE?t=17712) Watch the Salvager chest until it lands, or it can despawn. After it lands, check the weather to see if it will rain when delivering the blue flame. If it will be raining, make morning or noon now to avoid rain and night enemies.

_Korok::A16.notes: Getting the korok will un-smuggle the torch. Carefully jump down without running or pulling paraglider to finish delivery.

.dir(N>) midair to .loc(Lomei Labyrinth).notes: See map for where to drop in

_Tod::Night.notes: For stalhorse, stalnox, and quests after Rudania

Escort Yunobo.notes: Break ores during escort if missing amber (10) or flint (11)

_Discover<Lost Woods>.notes: BLSS should pass through this location

_Npc<Tasho>.notes: Move forward until you hear Oaki's dialogue to trigger the escort. Don't follow Oaki; he'll move along his path while we do the next steps. Note the in-game time that he starts moving; he will arrive at the shrine 5:20 later.

Activate .loc(Keo Ruug).notes: Don't enter shrine or Oaki will reset

_Material<4 Bird Egg>.notes: In tree near Hestu and near Deku tree entrance. For X13 and transmutation.

_Equipment::Weapon<Master Sword>.notes: Pulling the Master Sword sets durability of equipped weapon to 40. Suggest to equip the first double axe.

Follow Oaki.notes: Follow blue nightshades â†’ honey â†’ hollow log â†’ nightshades. Don't get too close to Oaki.

_Material<10 Restless Crickets>.notes: Spin attack grass to collect while walking to Oaki.

_Shrine::DaagChokah.notes: Don't approach until you see the Oaki say: "Woo! I finally made it!"

.dir(LW).notes: Glide until the white void stops, then drop

_Equipment::Shield<Rusty Shield>.notes: Keep the shield for a korok later

.dir(S>) + .dir(S) midairs.notes: .link([Ganon vod]https://youtu.be/WaebWctGS_k?t=22937). Need a high-speed windbomb to escape korok forest. .link([Easier movement without midairs]https://twitter.com/TaoPlusPlus/status/1525684201256787968?s=20&t=B-BWPy4MWcQnNr5kUJ9Tkg). Another option is to warp to Eldin Tower and BLSS to the top of castle.

Continue.notes: Close game first if IST glitch is still active.

_Tod::Night.notes: (Optional) If close to blood moon, making night will cancel it while you're in castle and give you enough time to get to Mijah Rokee. Do not sleep if it's between 9pm-midnight.

BLSS out of docks.notes: .link([Sheem Dagoze vod]https://youtu.be/s8UMMQmUioQ?list=PLxRHLKOlaIbj6REgghSRSqMeAPxUX33ax&t=11821). If you accidentally broke or missed bows, you can steal some extra from the lizalfos down below.

Run out, .rune(bomb) 2 walls.notes: See VOD for castle interior pathing

Blood Moon: Bomb arrow the updraft lever thru window
Glide to top of ladder, bomb wall

_Discover<Zelda's Room>.notes: Run into the room to get location

_Discover<Second Gatehouse>.notes: For the gatehouses, there are specific places to climb down and get the location without triggering the Lynel. Watch vod in those places for how to do it.

Drop extra weapons.notes: It takes a while for the meat to properly load in, so take advantage of that to clear out a few unneeded weapons, like woodcutter axe, soldier sword, hammer, drillshaft, etc.

Clip out to .loc(Guard's Chamber).notes: .link([Clip and OOB movement]https://youtu.be/s8UMMQmUioQ?list=PLxRHLKOlaIbj6REgghSRSqMeAPxUX33ax&t=12240). To clip back in, climb and press B when Link is angled outwards from the wall. Clear ragdoll.

_Korok::X21.notes: Shoot the top with ancient arrows

_Korok::X22.notes: Aim at top of the wall in background

_Korok::X25.notes: .link([Strat for rain]https://twitter.com/bings_f/status/1576785789534765056) (skip next gale if you do this)

_Boss::Hinox::Blue.notes: Shoot midair on the way to R40

_Tod::Night.notes: If you missed the blood moon, skip this. When the next Blood Moon occurs, warp to Mogg Latan and windbomb over.

_Warp::Shrine::OwaDaim.notes: Check map: 30.68% (if you skipped blood moon shrine, 30.60%)

_Boss::Talus::Stone.notes: Check that it's loaded in before unleashing fury

_Tod::Noon.notes: For Sasa Kai timing. Can make noon later in this segment for more margin of error.

_Snap::Quest<Forgotten Sword>.notes: This picture is lenient, so long as you zoom in and get the top of the sword in the picture.

Activate Pedestal.notes: Smash an ore and take a luminous stone for easier menuing. Check that you have at least 10.

_Korok::W02.notes: Keep at least 4 bananas for transmutation

_Boss::Molduga.notes: Shooting the molduga in the belly with OB and AA will kill in 1 shot

_Equipment::Bow<Golden Bow>.notes: (optional) extra bow to make a GEB

_Npc::Gerudo<Molduga Lady>.notes: Medicinal Molduga: 2pm to 10pm she's on the steps to throne room, otherwise in training yard. Talk twice.

_Korok::W35.notes: Can use bomb arrow from orb

Riding through canyon.notes: The lynels won't bother you if you keep the camera turned away from them.

Look .dir(SE) in the sky.notes: For Salvager chest. Watch it land.

Lake/Horse Minigames: Run to left side of bridge

_Material<Octorok Balloon>.notes: If you don't get one, you can buy one from the shop in Lurelin

_Npc<Start Horse Minigame>.notes: Need to finish twice, one under 1:30 and one under 1:15, to get horse saddle and bridle. Can dismount horse to restart if needed.

.dir(E) ride horse.notes: Ride across the pond, a bit past the right fork. Leave the horse there and windbomb to finish the korok. Do not whistle until after the next shrine, you'll come back here to pick up the horse.

_Boss::Hinox::Stal.notes: Kill stalnox while the horse is approaching you.

Archery Minigame.notes: Talk to guy while mounted on horse. Need to finish twice, with scores of at least 20 and 23, to get the saddle and bridle.

_Npc<Lady in Stable>.notes: Talk twice for Royal Guard's Gear quest

_Npc<Fruitcake Guy>.notes: Talk twice. In stable if raining.

_Discover<East Post Ruins>.notes: Glide below the height of the pole to trigger the location.

Kill .enemy(Stalkoblin).notes: Need to get here at night, otherwise get the one in Kakariko later.

_Korok::L20.comment: Bring to other side of spring

_Discover<Spring of Courage>.notes: Need to walk out past statue to trigger it

.fury() .!!(Enemy Camp).notes: Ancient arrow on the enemies that aren't killed by fury

_Korok::F28.notes: Use gale if raining; and then skip the gale at F13

.dir(N) short.notes: Midair or climb up beside waterfall

_Chest<Any of 4 Chests>.notes: Center of rock triangle. Use cryo blocks to get there.

_Npc::SheikaMale<Harpoon Guy>.notes: Take Back the Sea quest. In house if raining.

_Korok::F44.notes: Occasionally the korok will fail to trigger after removing the apple. Come back to it after the shrine and it should be fixed.

_Npc<Old Man on dock>.notes: Select "About the ocean...". Talk twice. In house when raining.

Destroy letter.notes: When you return to Finley, the letter will respawn on land

Letter Quest.notes: BLSS the letter to the guy at the tent. Fall and don't pull glider, and the letter will survive. Don't fall into water.

_Tod::Noon.notes: Make noon later if you can't get to Balloon Girl by 8pm.

_Korok::C51.notes: Yiga Blademasters often appear through this segment. Kill one for a windcleaver if convenient.

_Discover<Rauru Settlement Ruins>.notes: With superlaunch, can get this location while gilding through on the way to Helmhead Bridge

_Boss::Talus::Luminous.notes: Waste a fury if it's not raining. If raining, save a fury to kill the Keese around C09.

_Korok::R23.notes: Complete R24 before the last flower of R23

_Korok::R45.notes: If it's raining soon, skip the gale here to use later at R54.

_Korok::R54.notes: Use GALE to get to top of tree if raining

_Tod::Night.notes: If needed for stalnox. Make sure it's night before approaching the first flower of next korok.

_Korok::R66.notes: Do the one in the water first, to avoid a weird glitch that can cause magnesis to stop working.

_Korok::R50.notes: Snipe with bomb arrow from high above

_Material<1 Cold Darner>.notes: There's another on the bridge to the shrine if you miss it.

_Korok::T14.comment: Step back, aim all the way up

Activate .!!(Pedestal).notes: Talk to Kheel for Korok Leaf if you don't have one

_Material<Spicy Pepper>.notes: Pause+unpause to set menu on pepper for T09

Mipha's Grace.notes: (optional) Turn off Mipha's Grace now if you want to ensure it's charged for Eventide.

_Warp::Shrine::ShadaNaw.notes: Make night for Stalnox if needed.

_Korok::T19.notes: To drownwarp, use bullet time to fully drain stamina before falling into lilypads.

_Npc<Guy at cookpot>.notes: Talk twice. In stable if raining.

_Tod::Night.notes: Timing for Zora's Domain quests and darner quest

Start T06 race.notes: Do H53, H60, T08 while the race timer is going.

_Discover<Sturnida Hot Spring>.notes: Drop down above hot spring, then glide to updraft.

_Npc::ZoraMale<Blue frog kid>.notes: 7am-4pm near Mipha's statue, 4pm-8pm near Fronk. Talk twice.

_Discover<Akkala Bridge Ruins>.notes: Glide through location trigger on the way to pebble

_Boss::Hinox::Red.notes: Shoot from above, aim just below upper rim of hole

_Korok::N54.notes: Palm fruit on nearby tree if needed

_Tod::Noon.notes: Keep making noon until it's not raining.

.dir(E).notes: Backup blupee picture here along path if needed

Return 2 cuccos.notes: Near shrine and on top of clothes shop

_Equipment::Weapon<Traveler's Sword>.notes: Backup if you missed at Shee Vaneer

Collect 5 fireflies.notes: If you miss some and scare the rest away, you can respawn them by warping to Taloh Naeg. They don't spawn in rain.

_Npc::SheikaFemale<Paya>.notes: If she is not crying, then you missed some quest.

_Tod::Night.notes: Staying with Paya sets time of day to 7:00pm. You can skip making night if you need more time to finish the koroks before Lakna Rokee.

.fury() waste.notes: If not charged, waste it later.

Kill .enemy(Yiga Blademaster).notes: Normal arrow + OB will make him drop the windcleaver. Using elemental or bomb arrows is inconsistent. Use ancient arrows if you already have the windcleaver.

_Boss::Hinox::Stal.notes: If you don't make it here before 4am, continue and make night before entering Toto Sah. Then kill the Stalnox after D56.

_Chest<Chest in cave>.notes: Open any 1 chest for "Misko the Great Bandit" quest.

_Npc::SheikaMale<Man in cabin>.notes: If it's not raining, Calip leaves at 6:00am. Sleep morning in bed if he's not here. Text option 2.

_Npc::SheikaMale<Cricket guy + hotel lad.notes: Manny, Prima, Manny, Manny. Talk to Prima from behind counter.

_Npc::SheikaMale<Lab Assistant>.notes: Talk 3 times until you get the Hearty Truffle reward. Then talk again and select "I'm good".

Buy compendium pics.notes: If you sold springs last during transmutation and haven't reloaded a save since then, you'll get all the Material pics for free.

.dir(<W) + .dir(W>) midair.notes: (optional) can use a GALE for more height

_Tod::Night.notes: For Salvager chest. Make night if here after 2:30am.

.dir(<<S).notes: Pick up/put down rock and stand on it to windbomb

_Warp::Shrine::DahHesho.notes: .link([Missable Locations]https://drive.google.com/file/d/1hN-TJYfVUIlQGkuJYRkK4f0mCPJoIyxW/view). Also missable: Dining Hall, Gisa Crater.

.!!(Upgrade armor).notes: 7 full upgrades: Set of the Wild, Zora Set, Champion's Tunic

_Npc::SheikaMale<Rich guy>.notes: Sitting at western end of town past cook pot.

_Npc::SheikaMale<Hudson>.notes: Talk to Hudson again after the wedding

Check quests.notes: 13/15 Main Quests, 42/42 Shrine Quests, 75/77 Side Quests. Two pages of key items. .link([Quests in Order]https://docs.google.com/document/d/1sT8kNvatZR7gfKQrNI2YOg7ARvZIpoRd88a_bTnGOB0/edit?usp=sharing)

_Npc<Guy outside stable>.notes: Park horse near wagon. Talk to guy, cancel dialogue, talk again.

100%.notes: For verification please show (1) map counter, (2) quest logs, (3) upgraded armor, (4) key items tab.
